usage_rules.headings: Use 'Syne' for all H1-H3. Tight tracking (-0.02em). Uppercase for H1.
usage_rules.body: Use 'Outfit' for all UI text, descriptions, and metadata.
usage_rules.mono: Use for episode numbers, timestamps, and technical data.

grid_system.catalog: grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 xl:grid-cols-5 gap-6

containers.hero: h-[85vh] w-full relative flex items-end pb-20

Card.styles: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl bg-card border border-white/5 transition-all duration-300 hover:border-primary/50
Card.image_behavior: aspect-[2/3] object-cover w-full transition-transform duration-500 group-hover:scale-110

Input.styles: bg-white/5 border-white/10 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 rounded-lg h-12 px-4 text-white placeholder:text-white/30

Badge.styles: px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-mono uppercase tracking-wider bg-white/10 text-white/80 border border-white/10

general: Implement the 'Electric & Neon' theme strictly. No light mode toggles visible by default (force dark mode).
Use 'Syne' font for all headings to give a unique character.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states with 'glow' effects.
Use the provided image URLs for mock data. Do not leave empty image blocks.
Implement a 'Bento Grid' for the 'Trending Now' section on the home page.
The Video Player must be immersive: fade out controls after 3 seconds of inactivity.

pages.Home: Full-screen hero slider with 'Watch Now' and 'Add to List' buttons. Horizontal scroll lists for categories.
pages.Catalog: Grid layout with advanced filters on the left (or top on mobile). Infinite scroll preferred.
pages.Details: Large backdrop image with blur. Content floats over it. 'Episodes' list should be clean and numbered.
pages.Player: Minimalist. Focus on the video. 'Next Episode' button appears in the last 30s.

accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios are met, especially with the neon colors on black.
All images must have alt text.
Focus states must be visible (use the primary color ring).

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
